entry.title: https://github.com/aminosbh/sdl2-cmake-modules
entry.content: Modern CMake modules for finding and using the SDL2 library as well as other related libraries: SDL2_image, SDL2_ttf, SDL2_net, SDL2_mixer and SDL2_gfx. (Targets: SDL2::Core, SDL2::Main, SDL2::Image, SDL2::TTF, SDL2::Net, SDL2::Mixer and SDL2::GFX). Mirror of https://gitlab.com/aminosbh/sdl2-cmake-modules
